title: How do you report someone sending you scam via chat?

replies.body: Yes, screenshot it and submit it in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) under the category **I have a question > Game & Features > General Questions**.

Keeping the community safe from stuff like this is important, and DTN's suggestion to submit a ticket is a solid response against it.  Please feel free to include any screenshots, summoner names, or additional information that can help thwart this kind of shady business.  I also recommend using the blocking feature in the client to prevent them from messaging you.  Thanks for looking out for your peers!
